name: Kafka
description: This plugin ingests logs to Kafka Topic. This plugin provides support ingestion for JSON and CEF formatted logs.

configuration.label: Kafka Broker Address
configuration.description:
DNS/IP Address/FQDN of Kafka broker to which data will be sent.
Note: Plugin just need one broker that will respond to Metadata API Request.

configuration.label: Kafka Port
configuration.description: Kafka Port address to which broker is configured.

configuration.label: Kafka Security Protocol
configuration.description: Select the security protocol using which authentication will be performed and data will be sent to Kafka cluster.

configuration.label: Kafka CA Certificate
configuration.description:
Kafka CA Certificate in PEM format.
Note: This configuration parameter is only applicable when SSL is selected as Kafka Security Protocol.

configuration.label: Kafka Client Certificate
configuration.description:
Kafka Client Certificate in PEM format.
Note: This configuration parameter is only applicable when SSL is selected as Kafka Security Protocol.

configuration.label: Kafka Client Private Key
configuration.description:
Kafka Client Private Key in PEM format.
Note: This configuration parameter is only applicable when SSL is selected as Kafka Security Protocol.

configuration.label: Kafka SSL Private Key Password
configuration.description:
Password that is used while loading the certificate.
Note: This configuration parameter only applies when SSL is selected as Kafka Security Protocol. It is only needed when the PEM file is generated without a passphrase.

configuration.label: Kafka Topic Name
configuration.description:
Kafka Topic Name to which the logs should be sent.
Note: Kafka Topic Name should not have any spaces in it.

configuration.label: Log Source Identifier
configuration.description: This will be added as prefix to all the logs. (The log source identifier should not contain the whitespace).
